Text: Breakfast in New York Cc Feb RFF Board member Dod Fraser will host a breakfast in New York to introduce us to potential donors corporate foundation and individual and Board members in the area If you have names of people you would like to invite to this event please send them to me with contact information at your earliest convenience We appreciate your assistance in helping us expand our circle of friends I look forward to hearing from you
Frank Savageand I will meet with Frank at pm on Monday in NY

Board recruitment Cc Roger We regret that Fred Malek has decided to not pursue talks with you and Paul Portney about the RFF Board Thanks though for trying When the Nominating Committee met back in October they also thought that Steve Rales and Frank Pearl would be good candidates Would you be willing to try to set up a meeting with one or both of them now Also Paul and I will be in Atlanta on Jan and would have time to meet with Walter Massey if he was available Please let me know how youd like to proceed and how I can be of assistance And thanks in advance for your help we know how busy you are and appreciate any effort you can make at this time Lesli Creedon
